name: custom-plugin-data-engineer
description: Specialized learning system for data engineers. Master data pipelines, ETL, databases, analytics, machine learning, and cloud data platforms. Based on roadmap.sh with 800+ hours of data-focused content.
author: Data Engineer Community

agents.name: Data Engineer
agents.description: Master data pipelines, ETL systems, database design, and big data technologies. Build scalable data infrastructure.

agents.name: Data Scientist
agents.description: Learn machine learning, statistics, and data analysis. Turn data into actionable insights and predictions.

agents.name: ML & AI Engineer
agents.description: Master machine learning models, deep learning, LLMs, and generative AI. Deploy intelligent systems at scale.

agents.name: Backend Engineer
agents.description: Build robust APIs and backend systems for data applications. Handle data ingestion, processing, and serving.

agents.name: DevOps Engineer
agents.description: Manage data infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, and deployment. Ensure reliable data systems in production.

agents.name: Cloud Data Engineer
agents.description: Design cloud-native data solutions on AWS, Azure, or GCP. Master data warehousing and analytics platforms.

skills.name: Python Programming
skills.description: Python fundamentals, OOP, data structures, and scripting for data engineering

skills.name: SQL & Relational Databases
skills.description: SQL query optimization, schema design, indexing, transactions, and PostgreSQL/MySQL

skills.name: NoSQL & Data Stores
skills.description: MongoDB, Redis, Cassandra, DynamoDB, and key-value stores

skills.name: Data Engineering Core
skills.description: Data pipelines, ETL/ELT systems, workflow orchestration, and data modeling

skills.name: ETL Tools & Technologies
skills.description: Apache Airflow, Spark, Kafka, Flink, dbt, and modern data tools

skills.name: Big Data & Distributed Systems
skills.description: Apache Spark, Hadoop, distributed computing, and large-scale data processing

skills.name: Data Warehousing & Lakes
skills.description: Snowflake, BigQuery, Redshift, Delta Lake, and data warehouse design

skills.name: Statistics & Mathematics
skills.description: Linear algebra, calculus, probability, and statistical analysis

skills.name: Machine Learning
skills.description: Supervised & unsupervised learning, Scikit-learn, model evaluation, and feature engineering

skills.name: Deep Learning & Neural Networks
skills.description: TensorFlow, PyTorch, CNNs, RNNs, transformers, and neural network architectures

skills.name: LLMs & Generative AI
skills.description: Large Language Models, prompt engineering, RAG systems, and AI applications

skills.name: API Development & Data Services
skills.description: REST APIs, GraphQL, FastAPI, data service design, and integration

skills.name: Cloud Data Platforms
skills.description: AWS (S3, Redshift, Glue), Azure (Synapse, Data Lake), GCP (BigQuery, Dataflow)

skills.name: Containerization & Orchestration
skills.description: Docker, Kubernetes, and container orchestration for data applications

skills.name: Infrastructure as Code
skills.description: Terraform, Ansible, CloudFormation, and infrastructure automation

skills.name: CI/CD & Data Pipelines
skills.description: Jenkins, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, and automated deployment for data systems

skills.name: MLOps & Model Deployment
skills.description: Model versioning, experiment tracking, MLflow, model registry, and production ML

skills.name: Monitoring & Observability
skills.description: Prometheus, Grafana, data quality monitoring, alerting, and logging

skills.name: Version Control & Git
skills.description: Git workflows, collaboration, branching, and code management

skills.name: Testing & Quality Assurance
skills.description: Unit testing, integration testing, data validation, and data quality frameworks

skills.name: Career & Professional Development
skills.description: Portfolio building, interviews, job search, and continuous learning for data engineers

commands.name: /start-learning
commands.description: Begin your learning journey by choosing a role or skill

commands.name: /choose-role
commands.description: Select a specific developer role to focus on

commands.name: /roadmap-status
commands.description: Check your progress on your selected learning path

commands.name: /skill-deep-dive
commands.description: Get detailed guidance on a specific skill or topic

commands.name: /project-ideas
commands.description: Get hands-on project ideas for your current skill level

commands.name: /interview-prep
commands.description: Prepare for technical interviews for your target role

commands.name: /assessment
commands.description: Evaluate your current knowledge and find gaps
